Title: Narrative Deck Creation
Description:
Build empirical value deck with methodology guardrails, limits, and ethics.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Single-page summary complete
- Deep dossier companion document
- Reviewed by 2 external advisors
- Version controlled and hash-stamped

Title: FAQ Documentation
Description:
Comprehensive FAQ covering methodology, limitations, and ethical stance.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- 25+ common questions addressed
- Legal review passed
- Published to secure portal
- Version controlled

Title: Host Script Development
Description:
Create script for host-led presentation with founder off-stage.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Full script with timing markers
- Contingency prompts included
- Q&A boundaries defined
- Approved by all stakeholders

Title: Rehearsal Execution
Description:
Conduct 2 full rehearsals with live-switch testing.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- 2 rehearsals completed
- Issues documented and resolved
- Timing validated
- Fallback procedures tested

Title: Tier Matrix Definition
Description:
Define Early Believer, Whale Table, Ghost Ticket tiers.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Benefits clearly documented
- Limits enforced technically
- Refund policy published
- Price tests documented

Title: Soulbound Key Architecture
Description:
Implement non-transferable key issuance, expiry, and revocation.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Issuance logs captured
- Gated access confirms membership
- Revocation tested end-to-end
- Audit trail complete

Title: Payment Gateway Integration
Description:
Integrate card, wire, and crypto payment methods.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All 3 methods tested with live transactions
- Invoicing automated
- Zero reconciliation drift
- Refund SLA defined and tested

Title: Dunning Sequence Setup
Description:
Implement payment retry and dunning workflows.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- 30/7/1 day reminders configured
- Grace period logic implemented
- Recovery rate tracking live
- Escalation paths defined

Title: Collateral Publisher Automation
Description:
Versioned static site updates with checksum embed and rollback.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Deploy pipeline automated
- Checksum recorded per version
- One-click rollback tested
- CDN cache invalidation working

Title: Event Asset Bundler
Description:
Compile slides, videos, prompts with checksum and release tags.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Bundle script automated
- Checksums posted to Linear
- Git release tags created
- Asset inventory documented

Title: Key Mint/Gate System
Description:
Issuance script with retries, gating webhook, expiry crons.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Mint succeeds with retry logic
- Webhook validates membership
- Expiry cron runs daily
- Audit log to dashboard

Title: Payment Webhooks Handler
Description:
Success/fail tickets, refund automation with supervisor approval.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Webhook captures all payment events
- Auto-tickets created on failure
- Refund requires approval
- Dunning sequence triggers correctly

Title: Compliance Guardrails Engine
Description:
Scripts blocking claims beyond validated metrics.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Regex + rule engine implemented
- Redlines enforced in copy
- Override requires evidence link
- Audit trail for exceptions
